§ 1. Time of appointing electors The electors of President and Vice President shall be appointed, in each State, on election day, in accordance with the laws of the State enacted prior to election day. (Added Pub. L. 117–328, div. P, title I, § 102(a), Dec. 29, 2022, 136 Stat. 5233.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 1, act June 25, 1948, ch. 644, 62 Stat. 672, related to time of appointing electors, prior to repeal by Pub. L. 117–328, div. P, title I, § 102(a), Dec. 29, 2022, 136 Stat. 5233.
